itemDisplayName: 2 VMs behind a Load Balancer with NAT rules
description: This template allows you to create 2 Virtual Machines in an Availability Set and configure NAT rules through the load balancer. This template also deploys a Storage Account, Virtual Network, Public IP address and Network Interfaces. In this template, we use copy loops to create the network interfaces and virtual machines instead of duplicating the resource definitions.
summary: 2 VMs behind a Load Balancer with NAT rules
